sentences.english: I take care of my new T-shirt as a matter of course.
sentences.chinese: 我很小心我的新T恤，這是很自然的事。

sentences.english: Color transfer printing of T-shirt is one of process of textile printing.
sentences.chinese: 彩繪轉印是T恤圖案印花工藝中的一種。

sentences.english: The other half smelt a more neutral-smelling T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 另一半聞的是無氣味的T恤。

sentences.english: Adema is wearing shorts and a T-shirt, but has no shoes on.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪馬穿着短褲和T恤，但卻打着赤腳。

sentences.english: I'd like a big T-shirt, blue trousers and red shorts.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一件大T恤，藍褲子和紅短褲。

sentences.english: Why did you give us two T-shirts, both the same colour?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼你給我倆買了T恤衫顏色都一樣？

sentences.english: In the summer people dress in casual clothes like T-shirts and shorts.
sentences.chinese: 炎天，人們都穿休閒服裝，如T恤衫和短褲。

sentences.english: Airbrushing your stencil multiple times on a T-shirt can make for a great background.
sentences.chinese: 噴槍在T恤您的模板可以多次爲一個偉大的背景。

sentences.english: There's a black Batman shirt I really like.
sentences.chinese: 有一件黑色的蝙蝠俠T恤衫我很喜歡。

sentences.english: A pari of jeans and a T - shirt seem to the nearest thing to a global fashion.
sentences.chinese: 一件T恤加一條牛仔褲幾乎是全球的時尚。

sentences.english: Make some money with your own t-shirt designs.
sentences.chinese: 和你自己的T恤設計的一些錢。

sentences.english: That green T-shirt looks very good, I'll take it.
sentences.chinese: 那件綠T恤看起來不錯，我買了。

sentences.english: This software is applicable for the patterns in European and American fashions.
sentences.chinese: 該軟件可用於印刷歐美風格T恤的印花制稿。

sentences.english: Usually the burnouts dress in jeans and wear the black rock-concert.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒族一般穿牛仔褲，黑色搖滾樂T恤。

sentences.english: Champ launches a T-shirt to a man in the last row of the arena.
sentences.chinese: “冠軍”朝賽場最後一排的一名男子發射了一件T恤。
